main event: A flashing red light was observed near the local airport in Smithville, Tennessee on April 29, 1960.
interesting points: The object was described as round, about the size of a basketball, and flashing red.
The object came from the north, stopped three times, hovered to the east, and then disappeared.
The observer saw the object for about 3 minutes.
The investigating officer believed the object was likely an aircraft, but the observer was not completely sure.
There were no sounds associated with the object.
result: Likely an aircraft, but not conclusively identified.
sighted object: A flashing red light, described as round and about the size of a basketball.
